revised_title: The Effect of Pressure on Arc Spectra: Silver and Gold
tldr: This article investigates the effect of pressure on arc spectra, specifically focusing on silver and gold. The authors found that as pressure increased, the lines in the spectra broadened, shifted towards the red end of the spectrum, and showed a greater tendency towards reversal. The study also observed changes in the color of the arc as pressure increased, with the arc becoming white at higher pressures.
